about_the_game:
This is a DLC for the game, Emberfate: Tempest of Elements.

Are you curious about how the game was conceptualized and what the development process was like? You can find out now in this behind-the-scenes booklet PDF! It contains 80+ pages of content, including post-mortem reflections, behind-the-scenes game design and writing notes, conceptualization inspirations and process, scrapped ideas and two bonus short stories of Ruby/Cat and Ali/Walter!
detailed_description:
This is a DLC for the game, Emberfate: Tempest of Elements.

Are you curious about how the game was conceptualized and what the development process was like? You can find out now in this behind-the-scenes booklet PDF! It contains 80+ pages of content, including post-mortem reflections, behind-the-scenes game design and writing notes, conceptualization inspirations and process, scrapped ideas and two bonus short stories of Ruby/Cat and Ali/Walter!
